edu.cnm.deepdive.irt.hikethrough.entities

Class Level.Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.irt.hikethrough.entities.Level.Tile
  • Enclosing class:
    Level

    public static class Level.Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Location class "Tile" to determine where the map tiles begin to be place and iterate in a spiral fashion creating a hexagon-shaped map

      • fromRingStep

        public static Level.Tile fromRingStep(int r,
                                      int s,
                                      MapTileType type)
        This method determines where on the map we are based on number of steps moving in a counter- clockwise fashion from x = 1 out to the right of (0, 0)

        r - Parameter p is x is this case
        s - Parameter q is y is this case
        type - Type is the type of map tile, e.g. alpine, mountain, etc.

      • pqToRs

        public static Point pqToRs(int p,
                           int q)
        Main logic for determining position on the hexagonal game board through conversion of p & q to rings and steps.

        p - Parameter p is x is this case
        q - Parameter q is y is this case
        Returns:
